link_desc:
Template and associated script to allow monitoring of GPSd GPS devices

On a per-GPS unit basis, this will monitor:

GPS Mode

GPS Status

Number of Satellites Visible

Number of Satellites Used

It will then report all visible satellites to the GPS device and report information on each:

Azimuth

Elevation

Signal Strength

Use in current solution

GNSS ID

Space Vehicle ID

Runs LLD against GPSD to find active devices and currently visible satellites. Data on satellites themselves is fed in via trigger and should be run periodically via cron.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Trapper|Custom Script
